Highlighting Covid timeframe in NH

Source: R/scale_date_starfish.R
geom_covid_starfish.Rd

Highlighting Covid timeframe in NH

Usage

geom_covid_starfish(
  date1 = "2020-03-17",
  date2 = "2021-12-01",
  color = "grey30",
  linetype = "dashed",
  alpha = 0.6
)

Arguments

date1

default set

date2

default set

color

default set

linetype

default set

alpha

default set

Value

a custom geom
